code: import{combineReducers}from'redux';import alarmReducer from'./alarm';import uiReducer from'./ui';import modalReducer from'./modal';import authReducer from'./auths';import deviceReducer from'./devices';import weatherReducer from'./weather';import{reducer as formReducer}from'redux-form';var rootReducer=combineReducers({alarm:alarmReducer,ui:uiReducer,modal:modalReducer,form:formReducer,auth:authReducer,devices:deviceReducer,weather:weatherReducer});export default rootReducer;
